ResourceCache source

Description

Constructor function for the cache.

Members

NameTypeDescription
self.withDataAttr Object

Cache interface to put entries using dataAttr on the cache.
self.withDataAttrNoTtl Object

Cache interface to put entries using dataAttr on the cache and ignoring TTL.
self.withoutDataAttr Object

Cache interface to put entries without using dataAttr on the cache.
self.withoutDataAttrNoTtl Object

Cache interface to put entries without using dataAttr on the cache and ignoring TTL.

isEntryAlive () -> boolean

Checks if the cache entry for the given key is still alive. Also returns false if there is no cache entry for the given key.

Parameters

NameTypeDescription

Returns

TypeDescription
boolean

refreshEach (newEntries)

Refreshes each entry in the given list using the refreshSingle method.

Parameters

NameTypeDescription
newEntries Array

refreshSingle (newData)

Takes a new cache entry and refreshes the existing instances of the entry, matching by the pkAttr value.

Parameters

NameTypeDescription
newData Object

self.destroy

Destroys the cache object.

self.get -> *|undefined

Gets the entry with the given key from the cache, or undefined.

Returns

TypeDescription
*|undefined

self.info -> {id: *, size: number

Retrieve information regarding the cache.

Returns

TypeDescription
{id: *, size: number

self.insert

Creates a cache entry for the given value and puts it on the cache.

self.put

Puts the given entry with the given key on the cache.

self.refresh (value)

Refreshes the cache entries with the new value or values. The existing objects in the cache are matched by the pkAttr value, and additionally by the urlAttr, if available.

Parameters

NameTypeDescription
value Object|Array

self.remove

Removes the entry with the given key from the cache.

self.removeAll

Removes all entries from the cache.

self.removeAllDependent

Removes all entries of the dependent caches, including the dependent caches of the dependent caches (and so on ...).

self.removeAllLists

Removes all list entries from the cache.

self.removeAllObjects

Removes all list entries from the cache.

self.removeAllRaw

Removes all raw entries from the cache.

setDataForKey ()

Sets the cache data for the given key.
